a-na {LU₂}EN.NAM be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}PA-BAD₃-PAB lu DI-mu a-na be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na {URU}de-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU x x x x x x x x-ku x x x x x x x x+x-ni x x x x x x x x x-u-šu₂ x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x E₂ i-x x x x x x x x x i-zu-nun A-MEŠ x x x x x x-da a-na {LU₂}EN.NAM be-li₂-ia₂ as-sap-ra a-ki ša pa-an {LU₂}EN.NAM be-li₂-ia₂ ma-hir-u-ni be-li₂ le-pu-uš {LU₂}A-KIN {LU₂}A-KIN lu la u₂-ka-aš₂ x x x+x ṭe₃-e-mu be-li₂ liš-kun-šu₂ lil-li-ka i-su-ur-ri be-li₂ i-qab-bi ma-a x x x x ka-tu₂-mu {LU₂}ARAD x x x x mi-i-nu dul-la-šu-nu an x+x x AB₂.GUD-HI.A-MEŠ a-x x x+x u
